summaries.label: Infrastructure & Vulnerability Hunting Focus
summaries.text: Senior threat researcher specializing in adversary infrastructure hunting and vulnerability intelligence. Leverages passive DNS, WHOIS, SSL certificates, and network fingerprinting (Shodan, Censys, FOFA) to identify and map C2 servers, malicious infrastructure, and threat actor patterns. Published 17 research articles and built 10+ production security tools. Experienced in CVE vulnerability hunting with CVSS-based prioritization and detection coverage assessment for enterprise security products.
